summary: 07/25/1993: A small bomb hidden in a trash can near an ATM at a money exchange post exploded near the Haya Sophia Cathedral Museum in Istanbul. Three tourists and one local were injured. Kurdish militants were suspected.
target1: An ATM at a money exchange post
scite1: “Four Persons Injured In Bomb Explosion in Istanbul,” ITAR-TASS, July 26, 1993.
scite2: MIPT Terrorism Knowledge Base. "TKB Incident Page: Other Group attacked Tourists target (July 25, 1993, Turkey)." Website. Available from http://www.tkb.org/Incident.jsp?incID=7128.
